Header.title: Unlock Your Potential: Personalized University Guidance with MBTI
Header.paragraphe: Welcome to our innovative platform designed to revolutionize university guidance. We combine the power of MBTI, a renowned personality assessment tool, with advanced algorithms to provide personalized recommendations tailored to your unique traits and aspirations.
Header.tm: Using this platform, I discovered my ideal field of study and succeeded. It's intuitive and insightful, helping me understand my strengths and interests. Highly recommended for finding direction in education!

service 1.title: Career Assessment
service 1.content: Explore your strengths and interests to uncover potential career paths.

service 2.title: Career Path Recommendations
service 2.content: Based on the MBTI personality test results, offer personalized career path recommendations. Highlight fields of study and professions that align with each personality type.

service 3.title: Career Counseling Services
service 3.content: Offer virtual or in-person career counseling sessions where students can discuss their MBTI results and receive personalized guidance on choosing the best path for their studies.

service 4.title: MBTI Personality Test
service 4.content: Offer a comprehensive MBTI personality test directly on your website. This can be a simple questionnaire that students can fill out to identify their personality type.

subservice.title: Unlock Your Potential
subservice.content: Discover Your Perfect Path with MBTI-Based Career Guidance

major.title: Recommended Major for You
major.paragraphe: The chart below shows the compatibility percentage for each major based on your personality, enabling you to evaluate which major best matches your personality and interests.
